briefTitle: Efficacy of Dexlansoprazole MR on Heartburn Control in Participants Previously Receiving Twice Daily Proton Pump Inhibitor Therapy
officialTitle: A Phase 3b Multicenter, Single-Blind Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy of Dexlansoprazole MR 30 mg in Maintaining Control of Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease Symptoms in Subjects on Prior Twice Daily Proton Pump Inhibitor Therapy
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if patients with well-controlled heartburn symptoms on twice-daily proton pump inhibitor therapy remain well-controlled after stepping down to once-daily (QD) dexlansoprazole modified release (MR) 30 mg.

primaryOutcome.measure: Proportion of Participants Who Remain Well Controlled After Switching From Their Current Twice-daily Proton Pump Inhibitor Therapy to Dexlansoprazole MR.
